description: Also known as The 99 Beautiful Names (Asma al-Husna). Associated with All Creation, All Knowledge, All Power. Known by the epithets: Ar-Rahman (The Compassionate).

ninety_nine_names.meaning: The Trustee, The Disposer of Affairs

divine_attributes:
- Tawhid


Essence
Absolute Unity (Tawhid)


Domains
All Creation, All Knowledge, All Power


Symbols
Crescent Moon, Star, Calligraphy


Sacred Text
Quran (revealed word)


Primary Names
Ar-Rahman (The Compassionate), Ar-Rahim (The Merciful)


Relationship
Creator-Creation, Master-Servant, Closer than jugular vein


The Nature of Allah

Tawhid (absolute monotheism) is the cornerstone of Islamic theology

All of Allah's attributes are perfect and without deficiency
Divine Will: Everything that occurs is by Allah's permission and decree (Qadr)
Mercy Above All: "My mercy encompasses all things" (Quran 7:156)


Verse of Pure Monotheism (Ayat al-Tawhid):
                "Say: He is Allah, the One

Tafsir Ibn Kathir - Classical Quranic commentary
